value.customToken: Custom Token Generated with Private Key

firebase-config.createNewUser: Create a new user if this one does not exist?
firebase-config.clickDragHere: Click or drag the file here.

tooltips.apiKey: API Key can be found in the project settings.
tooltips.clientEmail: Client Email can be found in the JSON file, it is the client_email field.
tooltips.email:
If you have already created a Firebase user with an email address and password, just fill in your credentials.
On the other hand, if you have not yet created one, you can do so in two ways:
tooltips.json: To generate a JSON file, go to the Firebase, in the Project Settings section, click on Service Accounts and then on Generate new private key. This will download a JSON file which you can either drop in the area or open and paste into the configuration node.
tooltips.password: The password associated with the provided email address.
tooltips.privateKey: The Private Key contained in the JSON file.
tooltips.storageBucket: The name of the Cloud Storage Bucket.
tooltips.uid: Uniquely identifies the user or device you are authenticating.
tooltips.url: URL can be found in the Realtime Database console, this differs by geographic location, the link structure is as follows: https://<project-id>-default-rtdb.<continent>.firebaseddatabase.app/ or ends with .firebaseio.com for the United States.
